text: Tantui na i Marigi Alatala bɛ, naxan hinnɛxi i ra, a fa i dɔxɔ a xa mangɛ kibanyi kui, i xa mangɛya raba alɔ a wama a xɔn ma ki naxɛ. I Marigi Ala na raba nɛ barima Isirayila rafan a ma, a man wama Isirayila xa bu tɛmui birin. A i findi nɛ e xa mangɛ ra, alako i xa e yamari tinxinyi nun nɔndi ra.»
